[[right ventricle]] |- | RVAD || right [[ventricular assist device]] |- | RVF || [[right ventricle|right ventricular failure]], or [[rectovaginal fistula]] |- | RVH || [[right ventricular hypertrophy]] |- | RVR || rapid ventricular rate ([[tachycardia]]) |- | RVSP || right ventricular systolic [[Blood pressure|pressure]] |- | RVT || [[renal vein thrombosis]] |- | Rx or ℞ or Rx || (R with crossed tail) [[medical prescription]], [[prescription drug]], or [[Cure|remedy]] |- | RXN || reaction |} {{MedAbbrev|Q|S}} [[Category:Lists of medical abbreviations]]
